docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Mehmet Oz will question the credibility of critics who sought to have him removed from his position at Columbia in a segment on his show on Thursday, a spokesman for the show said.

headline.main: Dr. Oz to Respond on Show to Criticism by Physicians
headline.print_headline: Dr. Oz to Respond on Show to Criticism by Physicians

docs.abstract: Celebrity talk show host Dr Mehmet Oz plans to respond aggressively on The Dr Oz Show to letter sent by 10 physicians to Columbia University questioning Oz's position there as vice chairman of surgery department; letter criticized Oz's opposition to genetic engineering of food crops.
docs.snippet: Dr. Mehmet Oz will question the credibility of critics who sought to have him removed from his position at Columbia in a segment on his show on Thursday, a spokesman for the show said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Up to 5.3 million hens at an Iowa farm must be destroyed after the highly infectious and deadly bird flu virus was confirmed, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said Monday.

headline.main: Bird Flu Confirmed at Iowa Farm With 5.3 Million Chickens
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Confirmed at Iowa Farm With 5.3 Million Chickens

docs.snippet: Up to 5.3 million hens at an Iowa farm must be destroyed after the highly infectious and deadly bird flu virus was confirmed, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: An academic and activist looks at the conflicts that arise when science challenges popular beliefs.
docs.abstract: David Dobbs reviews book Galileo's Middle Finger: Heretics, Activists, and the Search for Justice in Science by Alice Dreger.
docs.snippet: An academic and activist looks at the conflicts that arise when science challenges popular beliefs.

docs.lead_paragraph: Everyone's body is brimming with bacteria, and these microbes do plenty of good things like building the immune system and helping digestion. But modern diets, antibiotics and hygiene seem to be reducing the range of microbes occupying our anatomy.

headline.main: Amazonian Tribe Study Shows How Human Bodily Bacteria Is Changing
headline.print_headline: Amazonian Tribe Study Shows How Human Bodily Bacteria Is Changing

docs.snippet: Everyone's body is brimming with bacteria, and these microbes do plenty of good things like building the immune system and helping digestion. But modern diets, antibiotics and hygiene seem to be reducing the range of microbes occupying our anatomy.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a remote part of the Venezuelan Amazon, scientists have discovered that members of a village isolated from the modern world have the most diverse colonies of bacteria ever reported living in and on the human body.

headline.main: Unprecedented Germ Diversity Found in Remote Amazonian Tribe
headline.print_headline: Unprecedented Germ Diversity Found in Remote Amazonian Tribe

docs.snippet: In a remote part of the Venezuelan Amazon, scientists have discovered that members of a village isolated from the modern world have the most diverse colonies of bacteria ever reported living in and on the human body.

docs.lead_paragraph: Columbia University has not removed TV celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz from his faculty position as a group of top doctors has demanded, citing his "egregious lack of integrity" for promoting what they call "quack treatments."

headline.main: Physicians Want Dr. Oz Gone From Columbia Medical Faculty
headline.print_headline: Physicians Want Dr. Oz Gone From Columbia Medical Faculty

docs.snippet: Columbia University has not removed TV celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz from his faculty position as a group of top doctors has demanded, citing his "egregious lack of integrity" for promoting what they call "quack treatments."
